tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Urban_Development_Projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  project_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Data (
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Date DATE,
  Time TIME,
  Location VARCHAR(50),
  Traffic_Volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Incidents (
  Incident_ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Incident_Type VARCHAR(50),
  Location VARCHAR(50),
  Description TEXT,
  Incident_Date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Trends (
  Trend_ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Year INT,
  Season VARCHAR(20),
  Traffic_Volume INT,
  Average_Speed INT
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Incidents (
    incident_id INT,
    city_id INT,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    incident_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Lights (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Cameras (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  type VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Signs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  sign_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Flow_Data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  time TIME,
  vehicle_count INT,
  avg_speed INT
)

CREATE TABLE Road_Construction (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)
